description: The salty halloumi in these burgers balance well with the beetroot salsa.
name: Halloumi Burger with Beetroot Recipe | Woolworths
recipeIngredient: 1 small red onion, peeled and diced
1 medium avocado, peeled, de-seeded and diced
4 medium brioche buns, sliced in half

recipeInstructions.text: In a bowl, mix together the chopped onion, beetroot, tomato and avocado and set to one side.
In a separate bowl, mix the flour with the paprika and cracked black pepper.
Coat the halloumi slices in the flour mixture and shake off any excess.
Heat up a pan to a medium heat and then add the oil.
Fry the halloumi slices for 6 minutes, flip and fry for a further 6 minutes.
Lightly toast the buns and serve with the burgers and salsa.
